de.erichseifert.gral.plots

Class PlotArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.AbstractDrawable
      • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.PlotArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PiePlot.PiePlotArea2D, XYPlot.XYPlotArea2D

    public abstract class PlotArea
extends AbstractDrawable
    Abstract class that represents a canvas on which plot data will be drawn. It serves as base for specialized implementations for different plot types. Derived classes have to implement how the actual drawing is done.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getClippingOffset

        public Insets2D getClippingOffset()
        Returns the clipping offset of the plotted data relative to the plot area. Positive inset values result in clipping inside the plot area, negative values result in clipping outside the plot area. Specifying a null values will turn off clipping.
        Returns:
        Clipping offset in pixels relative to the outline of the plot area.

      • setClippingArea

        public void setClippingArea(Insets2D offset)
        Sets the clipping offset of the plotted data relative to the plot area. Positive inset values result in clipping inside the plot area, negative values result in clipping outside the plot area. Specifying a null values will turn off clipping.
        Parameters:
        offset - Clipping offset in pixels relative to the outline of the plot area.
